title: CPI measures change in market basket price

content.question: The consumer price index measures which of the following?

choices.label: The change over time of the weighted prices of a particular group of goods and services
The change over time of the weighted wholesale price index
The change over time of the difference between the gross domestic product deflator and the wholesale price index
Inflation corrected for changes in the real gross domestic product
Inflation corrected for changes in the wholesale price index

content.answer: The change over time of the weighted prices of a particular group of goods and services
